description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jigsaw Puzzle Express includes over 100 puzzles with 12 different levels of play. Jigsaw Puzzle Express's 12 levels of play provide great entertainment for the entire family. From kids to you puzzle masters, we've got you covered! High quality puzzles of animals, landscapes, flowers, historic sites, cartoons, and more! Puzzle in HD like never before!
